pkgmetadata.longdescription: # WizSDK[![Code style: black](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/psf/black)Wizard101 bot Software Development KitA wrapper for [WizWalker](https://github.com/StarrFox/wizwalker) bundled with many other useful function.Designed to make building bots for farming / questing / bazaar sniping / selling / pet training## documentationyou can find the documentation [here](https://underpaiddev1.github.io/wizSDK/)you can download these from the gh-pages branch if desired## installclone the repo or install from pypi `pip install -U wizsdk`## discordjoin the offical discord [here](https://discord.gg/D9GRrbDzpt)## development installThis package uses [poetry](https://python-poetry.org/)```shell script$ poetry install```## buildingYou'll need the dev install (see above) for this to work### Docs```shell script$ cd docs$ make html```
